channel.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
channel.description:
Hey guys,i made a SpecialHandler but when i put it in my server,it gets an error when compiled,it says
[IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee85/Jordie_is_me123/compileerror.jpg[/img]
Can Someone Help?
EDIT : Lol oops,sorry i put the msn pic in,dint notice lol

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

I did declare the methods…and if i remove the methods from specialhandler ill get errors anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Grr ffs. You’ve put the methods in SpecialHandler… You have put…
person.fsBar… Or what ever. Declare the methods in client.class -.-… How hard can it be lawl. Then, if you still get errors, delete the methods in your special handler, H2H

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Anyone have a clue?

Mod Adam:

No, your specialHandler.

What you mean my specialhandler?i have got them all in it can’t recognise them[br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2007, 12:44:54 AM[/size][hr]Guys seriously i need an answer,i will give a reward

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Mod Adam, post:8, topic:150281”]Import those methods into your SpecialHandler.

Here’s a list of the methods you need to import:

[ul][li]fsBar[/li]
[li]l33thax[/li]
[li]specspell[/li][/ul]

There ya go.[/quote]

Kk,i put this in client.class right?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Import those methods into your SpecialHandler.

Here’s a list of the methods you need to import:

[ul][li]fsBar[/li]
[li]l33thax[/li]
[li]specspell[/li][/ul]

There ya go.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @allstar93 allstar93
item.description:
@allstar93 wrote:

hey jordie u still got a server?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpecialHandler
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Ill show you whats in my

[code]import java.io.*;
public class SpecialHandler {
public int specialAmount = 100;
public int specialDelay = 0;
public boolean usingSpecial = false;
public int specialDamage = 0;
public boolean returnWeapon(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return true;
}

}

}

}

return true;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return true;
}
else
return false;
}
public int returnWeaponEmote(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 1068;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 1658;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 1060;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 426;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 440;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 2067;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 2075;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 2066;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 2080;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 2068;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecDamage(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 18 + misc.random(8);
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 18 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 30 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 20 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 22 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecCost(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 25;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 40;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 75;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 100;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecProjectile(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 252;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 341;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 248;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 251;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 347;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 256;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 282;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 432;
}
else
return 0;
}
public void fsBar(int one, int two, int three) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.fsBar(one, two, three);
}
}
}
public void sendFrame126(String one, int two) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.sendFrame126(one, two);
}
}
}
public void l33thax(int id) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.l33thax(id);
}
}
}
public static void createSpec(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);}
}
}

public void process() {
if (specialDelay <= 0) {
specialDelay = 4;
}
specialDelay -= 1;
}
